授業方法:
This course is a combination of lectures, discussions, pair work, presentations and group work.


Update: (information for students permitted to take classes online) The materials will be provided via PowerPoint slides and some video lectures of select classes. The course materials will be located on Google Classrooms and the address will be provided through your Kwansei Gakuin registered email address before the first day of class. If you do not receive anything, please contact the instructor at rdavis@kwansei.ac.jp .

Update 2: Due to the recent situation, all classes will be held online. Information regarding how to attend classes
is posted on LUNA and all registered students in the class will receive instructions for attending Zoom lessons.
This information is also posted in LUNA under "announcements".

トピック.授業外学習2: All students are required to have homework completed before the beginning of class. Students who do not have homework completed might be asked to leave after their attendance has been taken.

教科書/Required texts1: Pathways, Listening, Speaking, and Critical Thinking 4, 2nd Edition
教科書/Required texts2: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 30% Participation; 30% Homework; 30% projects and presentations; 10% quizzes and tests
